dict.string:
Gives you scroll information from the mouse. Supports modern inertial scrolling unlike the built-in Mouse patch.
Origami http://origami.facebook.com/
Use of this patch is subject to the license found at http://origami.facebook.com/license/
Copyright: (c) 2013-2014, Facebook, Inc. All rights reserved.
Created by: Brandon Walkin
The horizontal amount scrolled per frame in pixels.
The vertical amount scrolled per frame in pixels.
True if the user's finger is down on the magic mouse or trackpad.
